thread.title: Chagrin Falls man sentenced for using stolen identities, illegal currency exchange to fund lavish lifestyle
thread.title_full: Chagrin Falls man sentenced for using stolen identities, illegal currency exchange to fund lavish lifestyle

author: Eric Heisig, cleveland.com
title: Chagrin Falls man sentenced for using stolen identities, illegal currency exchange to fund lavish lifestyle
text: A Chagrin Falls man who concocted multiple online financial schemes, including stealing identities and running an unauthorized Bitcoin exchange even while he was helping the FBI build cases against fraudsters, was sentenced Tuesday.
